reviews.review_msg: I think prof Xie is quite knowledgeable in the Chinese language, however, I found the content and her specific teaching less applicable in real-life everyday conversation. I also thought some of her grading was unreasonable. Fair workload, but classes were quite boring and because of this, I decided to no longer keep learning Chinese.

Lots of textbook usage is required, and she gives lots and lots of assignments, as if we wer in HS. She gives a short ltmd time for the quizzes, which I think is way too hard (full page,about 3 paragraphs of chinese reading)& fill in the blanks, even as a chinese heirtage speaker! I hoped that we skip the textbook & teach more aboutchinese cultures

I took the intensive classes CHIN 290+291. She is awesome. The pace/workload/fairness in grading is perfect. Really good at teaching always able to help. Most importantly, she is so clear; it's impossible to misunderstand her. One of my favourite profs.
